sentences.sContent: Never, under any circumstances, take a sleeping pill and a laxative on the same night.
sentences.sContent_eng: Never, under any circumstances, take a sleeping pill and a laxative on the same night.
sentences.sCn: 无论，在任何情况下，永远，不要在一个夜晚，同时吃，安眠药，和通便灵。

remMethod.val: lax(松的) + ative → 放松的 → 轻泻药

trans.tranOther: a medicine or something that you eat which makes your bowels empty easily
